com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupListBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupListBox

  • public class ScupListBox
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a listbox.
    This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using the base widget instead of this.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ScupListBox.ItemClickListener
      This listener interface is called when user click ListBox

        public static final int ITEM_BUTTON_TEXT

        public static final int ITEM_BUTTON_SLIDE

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupListBox instance.
        If the Listbox is shown on the screen, listbox should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

           String mainText)
        Adds a new item
        Parameters:
        id - The item id
        mainText - The main text of item
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If mainText parameter is null. or The id parameter is duplicated or negative.

      • setItemMainTextColor

        public void setItemMainTextColor(int id,
                        int[] color)
        Sets the specific item main text color
        Parameters:
        id - The specific item id
        color - The text color
        The color Array. Array size can not over ITEM_STATE_MAX. Each index means button states.
        ITEM_STATE_NORMAL and ITEM_STATE_PUSH.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - color size is invalid. or id parameter is invalid.

      • setItemButtonType

        public void setItemButtonType(int id,
                     int type)
        Sets the item button type.
        Parameters:
        id - The item id
        type - The button type
        The type ITEM_BUTTON_NONE is not display anything even if button text or button image is set. It is one of ITEM_BUTTON_NONE, ITEM_BUTTON_CHECK, ITEM_BUTTON_RADIO, ITEM_BUTTON_MORE, ITEM_BUTTON_TEXT, ITEM_BUTTON_SLIDE and ITEM_BUTTON_USER
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id or type is invalid.
        See Also:
        ITEM_BUTTON_MAX

      • getItemButtonType

        public int getItemButtonType(int id)
        Gets the button type of item.
        Parameters:
        id - The item id
        Returns:
        The button type
        It is one of ITEM_BUTTON_NONE, ITEM_BUTTON_CHECK, ITEM_BUTTON_RADIO, ITEM_BUTTON_MORE, ITEM_BUTTON_TEXT, ITEM_BUTTON_SLIDE and ITEM_BUTTON_USER
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is invalid.
        See Also:
        ITEM_BUTTON_MAX

      • setItemButtonText

        public void setItemButtonText(int id,
                     int resId)
        Sets the button text of item
        The item button type is set to ITEM_BUTTON_TEXT automatically.
        Parameters:
        id - The item id
        resId - The String resource Id.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is invalid.
        Resources.NotFoundException - If resId is invalid.

      • setItemButtonImage

        public void setItemButtonImage(int id,
                      Bitmap[] images)
        Sets the image of item button.
        The item button type is set to ITEM_BUTTON_USER automaticaly.
        Parameters:
        id - The item id
        images - The image bitmap array. Array size can not over ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_MAX.
        Each index means button states.
        ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_NORMAL, ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_PUSH , ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_SELECT and ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_DISABLE.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is invalid. and the images is null or length is not ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_MAX.

      • setItemButtonImage

        public void setItemButtonImage(int id,
                      int[] resIds)
        Sets the image of item button
        The item button type is set to ITEM_BUTTON_USER automatically.
        Parameters:
        id - The item id.
        resIds - The image resource id array. Array size can not over ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_MAX.
        Each index means button states.
        ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_NORMAL, ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_PUSH , ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_SELECT and ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_DISABLE.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is invalid. and the imageIds is null or length is not ITEM_BUTTON_STATE_MAX or each resource id is invalid.
